mapper.select: select mp.mem_pay_no , mp.lesson_no , m.mem_id , m.mem_name , l.lesson_title , mp.payment_date , mp.del_status , l.lesson_prepare , mp.status , l.mem_no , mp.del_name , mp.del_no from mem_pay mp left join lesson l on(l.lesson_no = mp.lesson_no) left join member m on(m.mem_no = mp.mem_no) where l.status = 'Y' and l.mem_no = #{memNo}
mapper.update: update mem_pay set del_name = #{delName}, del_no = #{delNo}, del_status = '배송중' where mem_pay_no = #{memPayNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) listcount from mem_pay join lesson l using (lesson_no) where l.mem_no = #{memNo}
